main event: Three college students observed three unidentified flying objects in the sky over LaGrange, Georgia, on the morning of 1 April 1966.
interesting points: The objects changed colors from red to white during observation., The students described the motion of the objects as erratic, moving up and down and back and forth., The objects were initially observed for about 30 minutes before they disappeared., All three witnesses later reported the sighting, and they initially mistook the lights for a TV antenna., The sighting occurred under clear moonlight conditions.
